# Welcome

Welcome to the Bahamas Research Permit and ABS system guide for applicants.

This guide has been prepared to assist you through each step of the online research permit and ABS system. The guide will take you through:

- Documents you need to provide
- Each step in the online system
- Expectations about project impact and benefit-sharing under the Nagoya Protocol
- Additional specialist permits that may be required in some cases.
